channel.title: Password incorrect?
channel.description:
Logined to moparscape's minecraft server with the new 1.3_01 from coonhunter did /login and password and says my password is incorrect anyone else experiencing this problem as well?
EDIT: When i login it says Welcome Player instead of Welcome Recker450

item.title: Password incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Then it’s your connection

Read full topic

item.title: Password incorrect?

only the trees of which i planted were gone
a couple of blocks
some blocks placed randomly
some torches missing
not a huge loss but i will move out somewhere[/quote]
If ur roof was leveled I would still wanna figure out who did it. Trees are never to be stressed.

it works now…got in and my house is so diff…the roof is leveled, Many torches about 10 missing and a door is missing along with other trees which i planted

item.title: Password incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:16, topic:385214”][quote author=loverboyg6 link=topic=480973.msg3526251#msg3526251 date=1299844981]
If you go to your profile settings on this forum, and then to your forum settings, you’ll notice that you can add your mc name. The server now uses your forum pass as your mc login.
[/quote]

dont do that i used a diff pass on server and i prefer different passwords for diff stuff
It actually doesn’t yet, but it probably will one day in the near future.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Password incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

loverboyg6:

If you go to your profile settings on this forum, and then to your forum settings, you’ll notice that you can add your mc name. The server now uses your forum pass as your mc login.

It actually doesn’t yet, but it probably will one day in the near future.

Read full topic

item.title: Password incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“loverboyg6, post:13, topic:385214”]There has to be a fix for this. I know for a fact that the admins can reset players.
EDIT:
I have a paid account, and I’m using no mods, so it has nothing to do with what files you have.
DOUBLE EDIT:
Now I feel like a huge idiot. If you go to your profile settings on this forum, and then to your forum settings, you’ll notice that you can add your mc name. The server now uses your forum pass as your mc login.[/quote]your statement is incorrect

Read full topic

item.title: Password incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“loverboyg6, post:13, topic:385214”]There has to be a fix for this. I know for a fact that the admins can reset players.
EDIT:
I have a paid account, and I’m using no mods, so it has nothing to do with what files you have.
DOUBLE EDIT:
Now I feel like a huge idiot. If you go to your profile settings on this forum, and then to your forum settings, you’ll notice that you can add your mc name. The server now uses your forum pass as your mc login.[/quote]
I have friends who aren’t on the forums that can still login.

Read full topic

item.title: Password incorrect?
item.dc:creator: @loverboyg6 loverboyg6
item.description:
@loverboyg6 wrote:

There has to be a fix for this. I know for a fact that the admins can reset players.
EDIT:
I have a paid account, and I’m using no mods, so it has nothing to do with what files you have.
DOUBLE EDIT:
Now I feel like a huge idiot. If you go to your profile settings on this forum, and then to your forum settings, you’ll notice that you can add your mc name. The server now uses your forum pass as your mc login.

Read full topic
